name: How to Send Files with WeTransfer
description: Step-by-step guide to sending large files using WeTransfer and automatically saving them to Google Drive

step.name: Visit WeTransfer
step.text: Go to wetransfer.com in your web browser

step.name: Add Files
step.text: Click the '+' button to add files or drag and drop them onto the page

step.name: Enter Email Addresses
step.text: Add recipient email addresses in the 'Email to' field

step.name: Add Message
step.text: Include an optional message to accompany your files
